message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hi Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the item. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position but I can't sell it for less than $130. It's a very good price for this.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $130 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $115.  This is my final offer.
